snippet: Firefighters throughout the West were taking advantage of improving weather on Friday to make strides against wildfires that have destroyed homes and scorched hundreds of thousands of acres.
abstract: Firefighters are taking advantage of improving weather to make strides against wildfires that have destroyed homes and scorched thousands of acres in Colorado, Wyoming and Montana.
lead_paragraph: Firefighters throughout the West were taking advantage of improving weather on Friday to make strides against wildfires that have destroyed homes and scorched hundreds of thousands of acres.
